content:
[Chip Huyen](https://huyenchip.com/)
[Blog](https://huyenchip.com/blog/) [Books](https://huyenchip.com/books/) [Events](https://huyenchip.com/events/)
AI Guide

[List 100](https://huyenchip.com/list-100/) [VN](https://huyenchip.com/vn/)
[ ![Chip Huyen](https://huyenchip.com/assets/profile.jpeg) ](https://www.instagram.com/huyenchip19/)
Iâ€™m Chip Huyen, a writer and computer scientist. I grew up chasing grasshoppers in a small rice-farming village in Vietnam.
My focus is on ML/AI systems in production. Iâ€™m currently exploring creative use cases of AI in education and entertainment.
Previously, I worked on ML tooling at NVIDIA (core dev of [**NeMo**](https://github.com/NVIDIA/NeMo)), Snorkel AI, and Netflix. I also founded and sold an AI infra startup.
Running a startup taught me that being a founder is incredibly hard, so I try to support founders in any way I can. Some startups Iâ€™ve worked with included [Convai](https://convai.com/), [OctoAI](https://octo.ai/), and [Photoroom](https://www.photoroom.com/).
I graduated from Stanford, where I taught [ML Systems](https://cs329s.stanford.edu). The lectures became the foundation for the book [**Designing Machine Learning Systems**](https://www.amazon.com/Designing-Machine-Learning-Systems-Production-Ready/dp/1098107969?&_encoding=UTF8&tag=chiphuyen-20&linkCode=ur2&linkId=0a1dbab0e76f5996e29e1a97d45f14a5&camp=1789&creative=9325), which is an Amazon #1 bestseller in AI and has been translated into 10+ languages (very proud)!
My new book **AI Engineering** (2025) is currently the most read book on the [Oâ€™Reilly](https://oreillymedia.pxf.io/c/5719111/2146021/15173) platform. Itâ€™s also available on [Amazon](https://amzn.to/49j1cGS) and [Kindle](https://amzn.to/3Vq2ryu).
Iâ€™m active on [GitHub](https://github.com/chiphuyen) and aspire to become a [Goodreads](https://www.goodreads.com/chiphuyen) influencer. You can also find me on [Google Scholar](https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=pwg2DGwAAAAJ&hl=en). I frequently speak at and occasionally host [events](https://huyenchip.com/events).
I enjoy learning about fun technical challenges and collaborating with great teams. [Reach out](https://huyenchip.com/communication) if you want to find a way to work together!

I help companies deploy machine learning into production. I write about AI applications, tooling, and best practices.
